titles: Several objections against the reducement of interest propounded in a letter with the Answer thereunto.
author: Culpeper, Thomas, Sir, 1626-1697.
Brown, Ignatius, 1630-1679.
R. W.
notes: Consists of two letters signed, I.S., and R.W., respectively.
